br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.types

Enum RepositoryType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RepositoryType>
      • br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.types.RepositoryType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RepositoryType>

    public enum RepositoryType
extends java.lang.Enum<RepositoryType>
    Classe que define as constantes para os tipos de repositórios de persistência.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
